the file usbgio_api_x64.lib is the release x64 build in:
 https://portal.thesycon.de/svn/nxp-plma/USBDevice_LPC43xx/trunk rev 98

the file usbgio_api.lib is the release Win32 build in:
 https://portal.thesycon.de/svn/nxp-plma/USBDevice_LPC43xx/trunk rev 165
 
The sln file is: https://portal.thesycon.de/svn/nxp-plma/USBDevice_LPC43xx/trunk/UsbGio_PC_vs2010.sln
